string: ALTER TABLE `reportimages` ADD `size` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '100' AFTER `print`;
ALTER TABLE `reportimages` ADD `max_size` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `size`;
ALTER TABLE `reportimages` ADD `border` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' AFTER `max_size`;
ALTER TABLE `reportimages` ADD `position` TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' AFTER `border`;
